actions.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 105-228.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 82.
Mr. Kim moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To designate the United States border station located in Pharr, Texas, as the "Kika de la Garza United States Border Station".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. border station located in Pharr, Texas, as the Kika de la Garza United States Border Station.

titles.title: To designate the United States border station located in Pharr, Texas, as the "Kika de la Garza United States Border Station".
